attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England, and indeed the Isles that make up our great country are CHRISTIAN, and the peoples of these fair Isles want re-assurance from government that these Isles will remain so.  We want the assurance of the government, that no matter what, our Queendom will remain, and always will be free from fundamentalist influence's. That we will, and always will be, a strong Christian nation, united by OUR lord God. And that no-one or their inferences will be permitted to alter our British way of life,,.....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
